permissions: Admin users can create time card reviews. Non-admin users can create reviews only for tender job schedule shifts associated with their broker membership.
side_effects: Creates a time card review and triggers an asynchronous automated analysis. The analysis may update the associated time card’s start/end times, create a time card time change, and possibly create a time card approval audit.
validation_notes: --tender-job-schedule-shift is required. The tender job schedule shift must be a broker tender job schedule shift and must not be cancelled.
